items.name: SERVER IDENTIFICATION TAG
items.comment: Identification of the Server of track/sensor information.

items.name: USER NUMBER
items.comment: Identification of the User of track/sensor information

items.name: TIME OF MESSAGE
items.comment: Absolute time stamping of the message in the form of elapsed time since last midnight.

items.name: TYPE OF MESSAGE
items.comment: This data item allows for a more convenient handling of the message at the receiver side by further defining the type of transaction.

items.name: FAMILY
items.comment: FAMILY to which the message belongs

items.name: NATURE
items.comment: NATURE of the message within its FAMILY

items.name: ACCESS KEY
items.comment: User password to be sent in the Connection Request.

items.name: ROLE AND VERSION
items.comment: Identification of the ROLE of a system and of the VERSION of interface.

items.name: VERSION
items.comment: identification number of the version of system interface (from 0 to 63)

items.name: DEFAULT CONNECTION OPTIONS
items.comment: This item is used to indicate that the default values of parameters required to set a connection are selected.

items.name: UDI
items.comment:
0 the domain of interest shall be the default one in the ARTAS geographical database
1 the domain of interest of the User shall be the Domain of interest of the ARTAS Unit to which this User is connected
2 the domain of interest is specified in the connection request

items.name: UPP
items.comment:
0 No upper limitation of the domain of interest
1 an upper limit is specified in the request.

items.name: LOW
items.comment:
0 No lower limitation of the Domain of Interest
A lower limit is specified in the request.

items.name: FPP
items.comment:
0 Default
1 A preferred FPPS is specified in the connection request.

items.name: GEOGRAPHICAL AREA
items.comment: Definition of geographical area in the form of a sequence of geographical points.

items.name: LOWER LIMIT
items.comment: Definition of the Lower limit of a Domain of Interest

items.name: LOWER DOMAIN LIMIT
items.comment:
Vmin = -15 FL = -1500 ft
Vmax = 1500 FL = 150000 ft

items.name: UPPER LIMIT
items.comment: Definition of the Upper limit of a Domain of Interest

items.name: UPPER DOMAIN LIMIT
items.comment:
Vmin = -15 FL = -1500 ft
Vmax = 1500 FL = 150000 ft

items.name: PREFERRED FPPS IDENTIFICATION TAG
items.comment: Identification of the Flight Plan Data Processing System from which Flight-Plan related information shall preferably be sent to the User.

items.name: CONNECTION RELATED REPORT
items.comment: Report message sent by the Server to the User in relation to a connection.

items.name: NATURE
items.comment: NATURE of the message to which the Report refers (0 to 7)

items.name: CALLSIGN SELECTOR
items.comment: List of aircraft Callsigns indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

items.name: TRACK NUMBER SELECTOR
items.comment: List of Track numbers indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

items.name: AIRCRAFT ADDRESS SELECTOR
items.comment: List of Aircraft Addresses indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

items.name: TARGET IDENTIFICATION SELECTOR
items.comment: List of Target Identification items indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

items.name: CODE FAMILY SELECTOR
items.comment: List of families of Mode 3/A replies indicated as track selection elements in a Service Request.

items.name: W1
items.comment:
0 Wildcard not set
1 Wildcard is set

items.name: W2
items.comment:
0 Wildcard not set
1 Wildcard is set

items.name: W3
items.comment:
0 Wildcard not set
1 Wildcard is set

items.name: W4
items.comment:
0 Wildcard not set
1 Wildcard is set

items.name: Mode 3/A Code
items.comment: Mode 3/A Code under the form of 4 digits in octal representation

items.name: DEPARTURE AIRPORT SELECTOR
items.comment: List of Departure Airports indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

items.name: DESTINATION AIRPORT SELECTOR
items.comment: List of Destination Airports indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

items.name: AIRCRAFT TYPE SELECTOR
items.comment: List of Aircraft Types indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

items.name: CURRENT CONTROL POSITION SELECTOR
items.comment: Identification of the Current Control Position to be used as track selector element in a Service Request.

items.name: TRACK/FLIGHT CATEGORIES SELECTOR
items.comment: This item defines which categories of tracks and/or flights shall be served.

items.name: TYP
items.comment:
0 tracks from live surveillance reports
1 tracks from simulated surveillance reports
2 tracks from both live and simulated surveillance reports

items.name: DETECT
items.comment: DETECT is used to filter out tracks depending on which type of surveillance report(s) have been recently processed for the track

items.name: VALTI
items.comment:
0 Default. All tracks are selected.
1 All tracks that have a calculated track barometric altitude (I062/135) or a measured flight level (I062/136) are selected.
2 All tracks having a calculated track geometric altitude (I062/130) computed using assumed height are selected.

items.name: STCOR
items.comment:
0 default
1 tracks correlated to Flight Plan(s) only
2 tracks not correlated to Flight Plan(s) only

items.name: TNT
items.comment:
0 tentative tracks shall be sent
1 tentative tracks shall not be sent

items.name: SPI
items.comment:
0 tracks with SPI flag shall be sent
1 tracks with SPI flag shall not be sent

items.name: ME
items.comment:
0 tracks with ME flag shall be sent
1 tracks with ME flag shall not be sent

items.name: TRAF
items.comment:
0 all traffic
1 General Air Traffic
2 Operational Air Traffic

items.name: FCAT
items.comment:
100 = IFR selected
010 = VFR selected
001 = CVFR selected

items.name: NVD
items.comment:
0 No filtering applied
1 No VDL 4 tracks

items.name: NUA
items.comment:
0 No filtering applied
1 No UAT tracks

items.name: NES
items.comment:
0 No filtering applied
1 No Extended Squitter tracks

items.name: ITEM SELECTOR
items.comment: The Item Selector is used to define the composition of the track information messages. The bits that compose the Item Selector identify the data items, and in some cases the subfields of data items that are to be included in each track update.

items.name: TM5
items.comment: Mode 5 Data Reports & Extended Mode 1 Code (I062/110)

items.name: COA
items.comment: Communications / ACAS Capability and Flight Status Age (I062/295 sf13)

items.name: SBA
items.comment: Status Reported by ADS-B Age (I062/295 sf14)

items.name: ACA
items.comment: ACAS Resolution Advisory Report Age (I062/295 sf15)

items.name: MBA
items.comment: Mode S MB Data Age (I062/295 sf28)

items.name: MCP
items.comment: MCP/FCU Selected Altitude Data Age (I062/295 sf31)

items.name: FMS
items.comment: FMS Selected Altitude Data Age (I062/295 sf32)

items.name: BPS
items.comment: Barometric Pressure Setting Data Age (I062/295 sf33)

items.name: TAL
items.comment: Target Altitude Source Data Age (I062/295 sf34)

items.name: COM
items.comment: Communications / ACAS Capability and Flight Status (I062/380 sf10)

items.name: APC
items.comment: Estimated Accuracy Of Track Position (Cartesian) (I062/500 sf1)

items.name: APW
items.comment: Estimated Accuracy Of Track Position (WGS-84) (I062/500 sf3)

items.name: AGA
items.comment: Estimated Accuracy Of Calculated Track Geometric Altitude (I062/500 sf4)

items.name: ABA
items.comment: Estimated Accuracy Of Calculated Track Barometric Altitude (I062/500sf5)

items.name: ATV
items.comment: Estimated Accuracy Of Track Velocity (Cartesian) (I062/500 sf6)

items.name: ARC
items.comment: Estimated Accuracy Of Rate Of Climb/Descent (I062/500 sf8)

items.name: CYCLICAL UPDATE CHARACTERISTICS
items.comment: Definition of the Scanning Period, Update Period, Max Data Flow and Extra Delay (to be considered for the track extrapolation) in case of cyclical service.

items.name: MSD
items.comment:
0 scanning by column
1 scanning by row

items.name: SCANNING PERIOD
items.comment:
time for scanning the mosaic:
range : from 6 to 32 batch periods
3 sec <= SCANNING PERIOD <= 16 sec

items.name: BATCH PERIOD
items.comment:
time period between two consecutive batches:
range : from 1 to 15 steps of 100 ms

items.name: UPDATE PERIOD
items.comment:
time period between the same batch of two consecutive scans:
range : from 6 to 3000 batch periods
SCANNING PERIOD <= UPDATE PERIOD <= 5 minutes

items.name: EXTRA DELAY
items.comment: range : 0 to 35 steps of 100 ms (i.e. 0 <= DELAY <= 3.5 seconds)

items.name: MAXFLOW
items.comment:
Maximum User input Data Flow:
range : 1 to 127 Kbytes/second

items.name: RADAR SYNCHRONISATION CHARACTERISTICS
items.comment: Transmission Characteristics for a service of the type radar synchronised.

items.name: NOP
items.comment:
0 no information shall be sent
1 a track update shall be sent after the time-window for the plot-to-track association is passed without a plot has been associated

items.name: DISCRETE PARAMETERS FLAGS
items.comment: This item contains a number of flags to indicate which category(ies) of discrete events shall be considered for triggering the track information transmission (a- periodical way of transmission).

items.name: TLF
items.comment: Track Life events (Birth, Death, no radar update)

items.name: TNB
items.comment: ARTAS Track Number changes (switch Master/Slave Track Number)

items.name: PLN
items.comment: Modification of Flight Plan related information (i.e. in the Miniplan)

items.name: COR
items.comment: Flight-plan to Track correlation/end of correlation

items.name: MOF PROBABILITY CRITERION
items.comment: Variation step of Mode-of-Flight Probabilities to trigger the transmission of track information updates (i.e. an update will be sent each time the variation between the current and the last transmitted MOF probability assessment for a given track exceeds the indicated threshold value).

items.name: RATE OF CLIMB/DESCENT CRITERION
items.comment: Variation step of the calculated rate of climb/descent to trigger the transmission of track information updates (i.e. an update will be sent each time the variation between the current and the last transmitted assessment of the rate of climb/ descent for a given track exceeds the indicated threshold value).

items.name: POSITION CRITERION
items.comment: Variation step of Track positional information to trigger the transmission of track updates. An update will be sent each time the variation between the current track position and the extrapolated position based on the previously sent information exceeds the indicated threshold.

items.name: RATE OF TURN CRITERION
items.comment: Variation step of the calculated rate of turn to trigger the transmission of track information updates (i.e. an update will be sent each time the variation between the current and the last transmitted assessment of the rate of turn for a given track exceeds the indicated threshold value).

data_fields.name: RATE OF TURN CRITERION
data_fields.comment:
Maximum value = 64 deg/s
LSB = (2E-2) deg/s = 1/4 deg/s

items.name: HEADING CRITERION
items.comment: Variation step of heading (i.e. Speed Vector) to trigger the transmission of track information updates (i.e. an update will be sent each time the variation between the current and the last transmitted Track Heading assessment for a given track exceeds the indicated threshold value).

items.name: SPEED MODULE CRITERION
items.comment: Variation step of Speed Module to trigger the transmission of track information updates (i.e. an update will be sent each time the variation between the current and the last transmitted Speed Module assessment for a given track exceed the indicated threshold value).

items.name: ALTITUDE CRITERION
items.comment: A threshold for triggering the transmission of a track. A track update will be sent each time the calculated track altitude or calculated track flight level has changed by more than the indicated amount since the last track update.

items.name: FACTOR K
items.comment: The so-called factor K is used to trigger the data transmission as a function of the internal accuracy by which the ARTAS Tracker has estimated the state vector elements. An update will be sent each time one of the state vector elements has varied from more than K time the standard deviation associated to this element.

items.name: REFRESHMENT PERIOD
items.comment: In relation to a service applying the a-periodical mode of transmission, the Refreshment Period concerns the systematic transmission of track updates for those tracks for which no changes have been detected.

items.name: MINIMAL PERIOD
items.comment: In relation to a service applying the a-periodical mode of transmission, a Minimal Period shall be specified to avoid that too close transmission intervals are applied when highly manoeuvring aircraft are tracked.

items.name: SERVICE RELATED REPORT
items.comment: Report message sent by the Server to the User in relation to a connection or a service.

items.name: NATURE
items.comment: NATURE of the message to which the Report refers (0 to 31)

items.name: SCALING FACTOR
items.comment: This item is used to select the precision by which will be coded a cartesian track position.

items.name: SF
items.comment:
0 Track Position coding precision = 1/64 NM
1 Track Position coding precision = 1/32 NM

items.name: SENSOR SELECTOR
items.comment: List of Sensor SIC/SAC identifications for which Sensor information are to be provided.

items.name: SENSOR ITEM SELECTOR
items.comment: This item is used to define the composition of the Sensor Information messages.

items.name: SRB
items.comment: SSR/Mode S Range gain and Bias (I063/080)

items.name: PERIODICAL CHARACTERISTICS OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE
items.comment: Update period of a periodical service of Sensor Information messages.

items.name: REFRESHMENT PERIOD OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE
items.comment: Refreshment period of an a-periodical service of Sensor Information messages.

data_fields.name: REFRESH PERIOD
data_fields.comment:
period of refresh when no change is detected
range : from 4 to 3600 s

items.name: DISCRETE PARAMETERS OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE
items.comment: Discrete parameters of an a-periodical service of Sensor Information messages. It defines which event(s) shall trigger a message to be sent.

data_fields.name: DISCRETE PARAMETERS OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE

items.name: TIME STAMPING CRITERION OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE
items.comment: Time stamping bias criterion of an a-periodical service of Sensor Information messages.

data_fields.name: TIME STAMPING CRITERION OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE

items.name: TIME STAMPING BIAS
items.comment:
variation threshold of the time stamping bias
Vmin = 0s
Vmax = 10s

items.name: SSR RANGE BIAS CRITERION OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE
items.comment: SSR range bias criterion of an a-periodical service of Sensor Information messages.

data_fields.name: SSR RANGE BIAS CRITERION OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE

items.name: SSR RANGE BIAS
items.comment:
variation threshold of the SSR range bias
Vmin = 0 NM
Vmax = +10.8 NM

items.name: SSR RANGE GAIN CRITERION OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE
items.comment: SSR range gain criterion of an a-periodical service of Sensor Information messages.

data_fields.name: SSR RANGE GAIN CRITERION OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE

items.name: SSR RANGE GAIN
items.comment:
variation threshold of the SSR range gain
Vmin = 0
Vmax = 1

items.name: SSR AZIMUTH BIAS CRITERION OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE
items.comment: SSR azimuth bias criterion of an a-periodical service of Sensor Information messages.

data_fields.name: SSR AZIMUTH BIAS
data_fields.comment:
variation threshold of the SSR azimuth bias
Vmin = 0deg
Vmax = 360deg - (360deg/2^16)

items.name: PR RANGE BIAS CRITERION OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE
items.comment: Primary range bias criterion of an a-periodical service of Sensor Information messages.

data_fields.name: PR RANGE BIAS CRITERION OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE

items.name: PR RANGE BIAS
items.comment:
variation threshold of the PR range bias
Vmin = 0 NM
Vmax = +10.8 NM

items.name: PR RANGE GAIN CRITERION OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE
items.comment: Primary range gain criterion of an a-periodical service of Sensor Information messages.

data_fields.name: PR RANGE GAIN CRITERION OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE

items.name: PR RANGE GAIN
items.comment:
variation threshold of the PR range gain
Vmin = 0
Vmax = 1

items.name: PR AZIMUTH BIAS CRITERION OF SENSOR INFORMATION SERVICE
items.comment: Primary azimuth bias criterion of an a-periodical service of Sensor Information messages.

data_fields.name: PR AZIMUTH BIAS
data_fields.comment:
variation threshold of the PR azimuth bias
Vmin = 0deg
Vmax = 360deg - (360deg/2^16)
